body:
Comment 3 by **xapwing**: 
What i did is:
1) once upon a time:
     hg clone https://code.google.com/p/go
2) yesterday i ran this script:
     cd \programs\go\src
     hg pull
     hg update
     Choice /M "Do you want to rebuild Go now"
     If Errorlevel 2 Goto End
     call make.bat   

So, I try to get the latest version of Go.
